# 🏗️ Nadaprabhu Kempegowda Layout (NPKL) — Phase-2 Expansion Plan Detailed overview of the BDA’s expansion project, with complete village list. Tavarekere highlighted separately.
## 📌 Background - **Nadaprabhu Kempegowda Layout (NPKL)** is BDA’s flagship housing layout. - **Phase-1 (2010)** struggled with litigation and infrastructure delays. - **Phase-2 (2025)** marks a large-scale expansion to tackle Bengaluru’s site demand.
## 🌍 Expansion Overview
Key Figures
  • 🔹 Total land: ~5,755 acres & 32 guntas
  • 🔹 No. of villages: 17 (across Kengeri & Tavarekere hoblis, Mysuru Rd ↔ Magadi Rd)
  • 🔹 Plots planned: ~4,000+
  • 🔹 Additional lands: ~3,200 acres from earlier drop + ~1,300 acres re-included
Geographic Stretch
  • 📍 Western Bengaluru region
  • 📍 Between Mysuru Road and Magadi Road
  • 📍 Beyond the NICE Road corridor
  • 📍 Involves multiple hoblis, including Tavarekere Hobli

⚠️ Highlight: Muddinapalya from Tavarekere Hobli is explicitly included. Other Tavarekere Hobli villages may also be affected, subject to BDA’s Gazette notification.

## 🏛️ Administrative & Legal Aspects - **Law:** BDA Act, 1976 - **Process:** 1. Preliminary notification under Section 17(1). 2. Landowners can file objections. 3. Final notification finalizes acquired survey numbers. 4. Compensation is awarded. - **Land Mix:** Revenue land, government land, private agricultural land. - **Overlap:** Some areas fall under **Magadi Planning Authority (BMRDA)**, creating jurisdictional overlap.
## 🚧 Challenges & Concerns - **Litigation:** Court cases from Phase-1 suggest similar disputes may emerge. - **Compensation:** Landowners claim BDA’s terms are less favorable than NHAI/KIADB. - **Environment:** Wildlife corridors (Bannerghatta ↔ Savandurga) may be impacted. - **Execution Track Record:** Phase-1 still underdeveloped; raises questions about timely rollout.
## 📊 Phase-1 vs Phase-2 Comparison
Aspect Phase-1 (2010) Phase-2 (2025)
Land Area≈ 3,800 acres≈ 5,755 acres (+3,200 acres re-added)
Villages12 villages17 villages (wider spread, includes Tavarekere Hobli)
Plots~20,000 allotted (few homes built)~4,000+ planned in Phase-2
InfrastructurePartial — complaints of missing amenitiesPlanned grid roads, CA sites, parks, drainage
## ✅ Key Takeaways - Phase-2 covers **5,755 acres** across **17 villages**. - Explicit inclusion of **Muddinapalya (Tavarekere Hobli)** highlights Tavarekere-side expansion. - Development promises 4,000+ plots but faces **litigation, compensation disputes, and ecological hurdles**. - Final clarity will come only with the **BDA Gazette notification**.
📌 Monitoring points: Land acquisition disputes, overlap with BMRDA’s Magadi authority, and BDA’s delivery on infrastructure commitments.
